name: Rabbit BoBo
description: Rabbit BoBo - is a casual puzzle game in which you have to think about your next turn. In the game you will play as the Rabbit and collect carrots. But thats not easy as it looks like, the obstacles will make you think twice where to go.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 512 mb Storage: 200 MB available space
